import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../../../styles/product-cart.css' import '../../../styles/index.css' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { cartAction } from '../../../store/shopping/cartSlice' const ProductCart = (props) => { const { id, title, image01, price } = props.item const displatch = useDispatch() const addToCart = () => { displatch(cartAction.addItem({ id, title, image01, price })) } console.log(cart.name) return (
{title}
${price}
) } export default ProductCart
